sense.def:
To huddle somewhere
pomeni nekje sedeti, stati ali ležati tako, da roke in noge stiskamo k telesu, ker smo premraženi ali preplašeni.

seg.quote: She huddled among the untidy bedclothes.
In the evening he would sit huddled near the stove.

sense.def:
A huddle of people or things
je majhna skupina stvari ali oseb, ki stojijo ali sedijo blizu skupaj.

seg.quote: They flopped down in a huddle.
